data.eml:eml: Notes on some toad bugs from China (Hemiptera, Heteroptera, Gelastocoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xie, Tong-Yin, Liu, Guo-Qing (2018): Notes on some toad bugs from China (Hemiptera, Heteroptera, Gelastocoridae). ZooKeys 759: 137-147, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.759.21627, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.759.21627
